Room.Name: Cellar Alcove
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a tiny alcove with only one direction to go.
Room.LongDescription: Apparently, someone long ago sealed the hallway here. The bricks blocking the hall are newer, and of a different kind than the bricks in the wall. Scrawled on the wall is the word, "BEWARE" and under it is an icon of a wolf, with dripping fangs. On the same wall is the cryptic, "YAB 371."
